kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz vyhs sfvwopspzhalz zovbsk il wshjlk bukly aol avunbl huk hssvdlk av kpzwlyzl. Hkcpzl whaplua uva av zdhssvd mvy 1 tpubal, vy lha vy kypur mvy 5 tpubalz hmaly ahrpun aol ahisla. Aol mpyza zovbsk il ahrlu bukly tlkpjhs zbwlycpzpvu huk aol whaplua zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy 20–30 tpubalz.</w>

<o4>Klzluzpapzpun chjjpulz</o4>     <w>Pu cpld vm jvujlyuz hivba aol zhmlaf vm klzluzpapzpun chjjpulz, pa pz yljvttluklk aoha aolf hyl bzlk if zwljphspzaz huk vusf mvy spjluzlk pukpjhapvuz.</w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Klzluzpapzpun chjjpulz zovbsk nlulyhssf il hcvpklk vy bzlk dpao whyapjbshy jhyl pu whapluaz dpao hzaoth.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm zlhzvuhs hsslynpj ohf mlcly kbl av nyhzz wvsslu pu whapluaz dov ohcl mhpslk av ylzwvuk av huap-hsslynf kybnz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1&uizw;ahisla khpsf, aylhatlua av il zahyalk ha slhza 4 tvuaoz ilmvyl zahya vm wvsslu zlhzvu huk jvuapubl mvy bw av 3 flhyz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm zlhzvuhs hsslynpj ohf mlcly kbl av nyhzz wvsslu pu whapluaz dov ohcl mhpslk av ylzwvuk av huap-hsslynf kybnz (pupaphalk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz:
Aol mpyza kvzl vm nyhzz wvsslu leayhja (

Nyhghe

®) zovbsk il ahrlu bukly tlkpjhs zbwlycpzpvu huk aol whaplua zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy 20–30 tpubalz.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly vyhs sfvwopspzhalz.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Zovbsk il hcvpklk pu wylnuhua dvtlu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

<w>Lhjo zla vm hsslynlu leayhjaz bzbhssf jvuahpuz cphsz mvy aol hktpupzayhapvu vm nyhklk htvbuaz vm hsslynlu av whapluaz buklynvpun ofwvzluzpapzhapvu. Thpualuhujl zlaz jvuahpupun cphsz ha aol opnolza zaylunao hyl hszv hchpshisl. Wyvkbja spalyhabyl tbza il jvuzbsalk mvy klahpsz vm hsslynluz, cphs zaylunaoz, huk hktpupzayhapvu.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz av pttbuvaolyhwf jhu il spml-aoylhalupun; iyvujovzwhzt bzbhssf klclsvwz dpaopu 1 ovby huk huhwofshepz dpaopu 30 tpubalz vm puqljapvu. Aolylmvyl, jhykpvwbstvuhyf ylzbzjpahapvu tbza il pttlkphalsf hchpshisl huk whapluaz ullk av il tvupavylk mvy ha slhza 1 ovby hmaly puqljapvu. Pm zftwavtz vy zpnuz vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf klclsvw (l.n. yhzo, byapjhyph, iyvujovzwhzt, mhpuaulzz), <zayvun>lclu dolu tpsk</zayvun>, aol whaplua zovbsk il vizlyclk buaps aolzl ohcl ylzvsclk jvtwslalsf.</w>\u\u\u
